argument.name: race
argument.desc: Required - Owner race of the corporation

argument.name: corporation
argument.desc: Required - Used for setting the homebase

argument.name: fleetName
argument.desc: Required - Used for flight wing and naming ships

line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Creates and maintains Corporation Jobs ships
* Set up sizes for arrays and loops
* Detach ships from job if station destroyed
* Only make military ships for the pirates
* parameter: $PopulateClass.toPopulate = the ship class to populate
* parameter: $CreateShips.type = the ship type to create
* parameter: $CreateShips.ships = a preallocated array with the size of the number of desired ships
* Each empty element will be filled with a newly created ship.
* parameter: $CreateShip.toCreate = the ship type to create
* parameter: AddEquipment.toShip = the ship to add equipment to
* parameter: $CreateFighters.homebase = the ship type to add fighters to

sval.val: Required - Owner race of the corporation
Required - Used for setting the homebase
Required - Used for flight wing and naming ships
DESCRIPTION: Creates and maintains Corporation Jobs ships
Set up sizes for arrays and loops
Detach ships from job if station destroyed
Only make military ships for the pirates
parameter: $PopulateClass.toPopulate = the ship class to populate
parameter: $CreateShips.type = the ship type to create
parameter: $CreateShips.ships = a preallocated array with the size of the number of desired ships
Each empty element will be filled with a newly created ship.
parameter: $CreateShip.toCreate = the ship type to create
parameter: AddEquipment.toShip = the ship to add equipment to
parameter: $CreateFighters.homebase = the ship type to add fighters to
